text.section:
A person may not:
Willfully or knowingly take an individual who has an infectious disease that endangers public health to the home of another individual;
Carelessly expose an individual to another who has an infectious disease that endangers public health; or
Permit a child who has an infectious disease that endangers public health to be in a public place while in charge of the child.
A person who violates any provision of this section is subject to a fine not exceeding $100.
